price: (76) Reclining on green cushions and beautiful fine carpets.
arabic: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ رَفۡرَفٍ خُضۡرٖ وَعَبۡقَرِيٍّ حِسَانٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: muttakiīna ʿalā rafrafin khuḍ'rin waʿabqariyyin ḥisānin
